overview.role_description:
1. Ciaccona is an Aero Sub-DPS/Support, with a kit centered around Resonance Liberation DMG.
2. Ciaccona can consistently inflict [Aero Erosion] through Basic Attacks, Resonance Skill, Forte Circuit, Resonance Liberation, and Intro Skill, ensuring rapid and stable uptime.
3. While in Solo Concert, Ciaccona increases the team's Aero DMG. Her Outro Skill boosts enemy [Aero Erosion] DMG taken.
4. Ciaccona's Enhanced Heavy Attack continuously pulls enemies, giving her a major advantage against groups.
5. Ciaccona's Resonance Liberation features a rhythm-game mechanic, where pressing buttons during the Resonance Liberation applies either Aero Negative Status or Spectro Frazzle in an AoE.
overview.synopsis:
1. Tip: Use Basic Attacks/Intro Skill to build [Musical Essence]. At 3 bars, cast enhanced Heavy Attack, then chain into Resonance Skill and Resonance Liberation. Tap yellow button and swap out when supporting a Spectro main DPS. For Aero Negative Status/Aero main DPS, simply switch out after using Resonance Liberation.
2. Rotation: 4A- Dodge -4A-E- Enhanced H-R.
3. Team Comp: Ciaccona is a must-have Support in Aero Negative Status teams, though no ideal Aero main DPS exists yet. Ciaccona currently fits best in a off-field Spectro Frazzle Support for a Phoebe main DPS team. Recommended comp: Phoebe + Ciaccona + Shorekeeper. Please refer to the full guide for team rotation.
overview.rotation:
Skill Breakdown
1. Forte Circuit
When [Musical Essence] reaches 3 segments, Ciaccona can unleash an enhanced Heavy Attack, dealing Aero DMG, pulling enemies, and applying [Aero Erosion] on hit.
● [Musical Essence] Gain: Max is 3 segments. +1 segment when using A4 or Intro Skill.
2. Resonance Liberation
Unleashes AoE Aero DMG around and enters Recital. While Recital is active, Ciaccona gains access to 2 modes, triggered by tapping green (apply [Aero Erosion] or yellow buttons (apply [Spectro Frazzle]).
● When Recital is active: ① Switching characters does not end the effect. The last button pressed determines which Negative Status is applied off-field. If you switch without pressing any button, Aero Negative Status is applied by default. ② Ciaccona gains 50% DMG Reduction and Anti-Interrupt. ③ The Recital state can be manually ended early by tapping Resonance Liberation again, or by swapping back to Ciaccona after she's already off-field. ④ Teamwide Aero DMG boost.
3. Resonance Skill
Dashes forward, dealing DMG and applying 1 stack of [Aero Erosion]. Follow-up Basic Attack will go straight into A2. This skill can be used mid-air. If Ciaccona uses her Resonance Skill to interrupt Basic Attacks, Heavy Attacks, Mid-air Attacks, or Solo Concert, she will summon an Ensemble Sylph to continue attacking in her place.
Note: Only when interrupting A4 or Solo Concert will the Ensemble Sylph enter the Solo Concert state.
4. Normal Attack
● Basic Attack: 4-hit sequence (A1–A4). A4 applies 1 stack of [Aero Erosion]. Dodging mid-combo (A1/A2/A3) and following up with Basic Attack will resume from the interrupted point, not A1. After A4, she enters Solo Concert state, which boosts team Aero DMG. If A4 or Solo Concert is interrupted, an [Ensemble Sylph] (max 2) is generated. [Ensemble Sylph] can attack in Ciaccona's place and trigger or maintain [Solo Concert].
● Heavy Attack: Consumes STA to leap and strike mid-air.
● Aimed Attack: Aim to enter Aiming Mode to fire charged shots, considered Heavy Attack DMG.
● Mid-air Attack: Consumes STA to perform up to 2 consecutive attacks. Normal Attack after Mid-air Attack Stage 2 to cast Basic Attack Stage 4.
● Dodge Counter: Triggers Basic Attack on a successful dodge.
5. Intro Skill
Deals Aero DMG and applies [Aero Erosion]. Your next Basic Attack skips to A3.
6. Outro Skill
Applies a powerful [Aero Erosion] vulnerability for 30s to enemies around the entering character, massively boosting the team's [Aero Erosion] DMG
Team Comp Analysis:
Ciaccona can inflict [Aero Erosion] on enemies, boosting Aero DMG for the entire team. Her Outro Skill enhances the team's [Aero Erosion] DMG, making her highly compatible with Aero teams and Aero Negative Status setups. On top of that, Ciaccona's Resonance Liberation inflicts [Spectro Frazzle] on enemies, which benefits characters who rely on applying Spectro Negative Status while off-field.
Team Comp & Rotation:
In the following rotations: A = Basic Attack; H = Heavy Attack; E = Resonance Skill; R = Resonance Liberation; Q = Echo Skill.
● Phoebe + Ciaccona + Shorekeeper.
Top-tier comp in the current meta. Phoebe keeps her Absolution state to deal sustained DMG. Ciaccona supports from off-field, spreading [Spectro Frazzle] to groups of enemies, boosting Phoebe's output. Shorekeeper provides additional DMG buffs and healing.
① Start with Phoebe using E.
② Shorekeeper 4AH*2-ERQ. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
③ Ciaccona enters with Intro Skill + 2A - Dodge - 4A - E - Enhanced H - R - Tap yellow button to achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out.
④ Phoebe takes the field with Intro Skill + H-E-R-3AH*4. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
⑤ Shorekeeper enters with Intro Skill and repeats the previous rotation.
● Jiyan + Ciaccona + Aero Rover.
Ciaccona boosts Jiyan's Aero DMG and applies [Aero Erosion], while Aero Rover supplements Aero DMG for Jiyan and provides team-wide healing.
① Aero Rover starts with EAA without achieving full Concerto Energy;
② Jiyan E-Q without fully charging Concerto Energy;
③ Aero Rover EAA*2- Ultimate EE-QR to achieve full Concerto Energy;
④ Ciaccona enters with Intro Skill + 2A - Dodge - 4A - E - Enhanced H - R to Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
⑤ Jiyan takes the field with Intro Skill + R-E-3A*n-E.
● Zani + Ciaccona + Shorekeeper/Verina.
Ciaccona applies [Spectro Frazzle] in the background to boost Zani's energy conversion and keep the rotation flowing. Shorekeeper/Verina provides additional DMG buffs and healing.
① Ciaccona starts with 4A - Dodge - 4A - R - Tap yellow button without achieving full Concerto Energy;
② Healer fully charges Concerto Energy and leaves.
③ Zani takes the field with Intro Skill + 5A-E without achieving full Concerto Energy;
④ Ciaccona enters with 4A-E- Enhanced H to fully charge Concerto Energy and leaves;
⑤ Zani takes the field with Intro Skill + R1-3A*2-R2. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
● Potential Main DPS in Aero Negative Status teams + Ciaccona + Aero Rover.
The [Aero Erosion] comp doesn't have a perfect main DPS yet—but it has major potential!
Ciaccona applies [Aero Erosion] consistently, boosting both [Aero Erosion] DMG and team Aero DMG. Aero Rover plays dual roles, healer and off-field DPS, while increasing the max stacks of [Aero Erosion] on enemies. Aero Rover's signature weapon further boosts team-wide Aero DMG.
① Aero Rover EAA*3- Ultimate EE-QR to achieve full Concerto Energy;
② Ciaccona enters with Intro Skill + 2A - Dodge - 4A - E - Enhanced H - R to Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
③ Main DPS enters with Intro Skill.

texts.name: Woodland Aria
texts.effectDescription: ATK is increased by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Inflicting Aero Erosion on the target gives (20%/25%/30%/35%/40%) Aero DMG Bonus for (10/10/10/10/10)s. Hitting targets with Aero Erosion reduces their Aero RES by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%) for (20/20/20/20/20)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.name: Static Mist
texts.effectDescription: Increases Energy Regen by (12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%). Incoming Resonator's ATK is increased by (10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%) for (14/14/14/14/14)s, stackable for up to (1/1/1/1/1) times after the wielder casts Outro Skill.

texts.name: Romance in Farewell
texts.effectDescription: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by (4%/5%/6%/7%/8%) for (10/10/10/10/10)s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to (4/4/4/4/4) times.

texts.name: Reminiscence: Fleurdelys
texts.skillDescription:
Summon the Windcleaver to attack the target, dealing 27.36% Aero DMG 8 times and 136.80% Aero DMG once.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 10.00% Aero DMG Bonus. If this Resonator is Rover: Aero or ???, grant another 10.00% Aero DMG Bonus.

CD: 20s.

texts.name: Gusts of Welkin
texts.description: Inflicting Aero Erosion upon enemies increases Aero DMG for all Resonators in the team by 15%, and for the Resonator triggering this effect by an additional 15%, lasting for 20s.

texts.name: Gusts of Welkin
texts.description: Aero DMG + 10%

texts.name: Bell-Borne Geochelone
texts.skillDescription:
Activate the protection of Bell-Borne Geochelone. Deal Glacio DMG based on 145.92% of the current character's DEF to nearby enemies, and obtain a Bell-Borne Shield that lasts for 15s



The Bell-Borne Shield provides 50.00% DMG Reduction and 10.00% DMG Boost for the current team members, and disappears after the current character is hit for 3 times.



CD: 20s

texts.name: Moonlit Clouds
texts.description: Upon using Outro Skill, increases the ATK of the next Resonator by 22.5% for 15s.

texts.name: Moonlit Clouds
texts.description: Energy Regen + 10%.

texts.name: Luminous Hymn
texts.effectDescription: Increase ATK by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Dealing DMG to targets with Spectro Frazzle grants the wielder (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) Basic Attack DMG Bonus and (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) Heavy Attack DMG Bonus, stacking up to (3/3/3/3/3) {Cus:Sap,S=time P=times SapTag=2} for (6/6/6/6/6)s. Casting Outro Skill Amplifies the Spectro Frazzle DMG on targets around the active Resonator by (30%/37.5%/45%/52.5%/60%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.name: Nightmare: Mourning Aix
texts.skillDescription:
Summon a Nightmare: Mourning Aix to attack surrounding enemies, dealing 273.60% Spectro DMG. DMG dealt to enemies inflicted by Spectro Frazzle is increased by 100.00%.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 12.00% Spectro DMG Bonus.

CD: 25s.

texts.name: Eternal Radiance
texts.description: Inflicting Spectro Frazzle on enemies increases Crit. Rate by 20% for 15s. Attacking enemies inflicted with 10 stacks of Spectro Frazzle grants 15% Spectro DMG Bonus for 15s.

texts.name: Stellar Symphony
texts.effectDescription: Increase HP by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Restore (8/10/12/14/16) Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered (1/1/1/1/1) time(s) every (20/20/20/20/20)s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party members' ATK by (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.name: Fallacy of No Return
texts.skillDescription:
Activate the Echo Skill to summon a fraction of the Fallacy of No Return's power and deal a blast to the surrounding area, inflicting Spectro DMG equal to 15.86% of max HP, after which the Resonator gains 10% bonus Energy Regen and all team members 10% bonus ATK for 20s.

Hold Echo Skill to unleash a series of flurry assaults at the cost of STA, each dealing Spectro DMG equal to 1.58% of max HP; Release to end the assail in a powerful blow, dealing Spectro DMG equal to 19.82% of max HP.

CD: 20s

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Increases the ATK of all party members by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.

texts.name: Interlude Tune
texts.description: Casting Resonance Liberation Singer's Triple Cadenza grants Ciaccona a Shield equal to 12% of her Max HP for 2s. Switching out Ciaccona removes the Shield.

texts.name: Winds of Rinascita
texts.description: Increase Heavy Attack - Quadruple Downbeat's DMG by 30%.

texts.name: Windcalling Tune
texts.description: Aero Erosion DMG dealt to targets near the active Resonator is Amplified by 100% for 30s.

texts.name: Quadruple Time Steps
texts.description:
Basic Attack

Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG. Basic Attack Stage 4 inflicts 1 stack of Aero Erosion upon the target hit.

- When the first three stages of Ciaccona's Basic Attack are interrupted by dodging, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Basic Attack in time to resume the attack cycle and cast the corresponding Basic Attack stage.

- After Basic Attack Stage 4, Ciaccona starts a Solo Concert. If Ciaccona's Basic Attack Stage 4 or Solo Concert ends early (proactively or being interrupted), an Ensemble Sylph is generated.



Solo Concert

When Ciaccona or Ensemble Sylph performs Solo Concert, they give 24% Aero DMG Bonus to all nearby Resonators in the team. This effect is not stackable.



Ensemble Sylph

Up to 2 Ensemble Sylphs may exist simultaneously.

If Ciaccona's Basic Attack Stage 4 is interrupted, the Ensemble Sylphs generated will finish the attack for Ciaccona and enter Solo Concert.

If Ciaccona's Solo Concert is interrupted, the Ensemble Sylphs generated will continue the Solo Concert for Ciaccona.

Aside from the two situations mentioned above, Ensemble Sylphs generated by Resonance Skill will finish Ciaccona's current attack without entering Solo Concert.



Heavy Attack

Consume STA to jump into mid-air and attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.



Aimed Attack

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Aim to enter Aiming Mode to fire charged shots, dealing Aero DMG, considered Heavy Attack DMG.



Mid-air Attack

Consume STA to perform up to 2 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG.

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack after Mid-air Attack Stage 2 to cast Basic Attack Stage 4.



Dodge Counter

Follow up successful Dodges with Basic Attack to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

texts.name: Harmonic Allegro
texts.description:
Move a certain distance, dealing Aero DMG and inflicting 1 stack of Aero Erosion on the target upon hit.

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack in time to cast Basic Attack Stage 2.

- When Ciaccona interrupts Basic Attack, Heavy Attack, Mid-air Attack, or Solo Concert with Resonance Skill, an Ensemble Sylph is generated.

- Ciaccona's Resonance Skill can be cast in mid-air.

texts.name: Symphony of Wind and Verse
texts.description:
Heavy Attack - Quadruple Downbeat

When there are 3 segments of Musical Essence, Heavy Attack is replaced with Heavy Attack - Quadruple Downbeat.

Consume all Musical Essence to shoot Downbeat Notes forward to deal Aero DMG, pulling in the nearby targets and inflicting 1 stack of Aero Erosion on the target hit.

Heavy Attack - Quadruple Downbeat can be cast in mid-air close to the ground.



Musical Essence

Ciaccona can hold up to 3 segments of Musical Essence.

Casting Basic Attack Stage 4 or Intro Skill recovers 1 segment of Musical Essence.

texts.name: Singer's Triple Cadenza
texts.description:
Ciaccona and Ensemble Sylphs perform an Improvised Symphonic Poem together, dealing Aero DMG once to the nearby targets and entering Recital.



Recital

When in Recital, sound waves will periodically radiate around Ciaccona. When the sound wave overlaps with the circle indicator, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} the green or yellow buttons to generate Symphonic Poem: Tonic of the corresponding color and recover a certain amount of Concerto Energy.

During Recital:

- Switching to another Resonator doesn't end Recital, but automatically generates a Symphonic Poem: Tonic matching the color of the last generated Tonic before switching. A green Symphonic Poem: Tonic is generated by default if no interaction input is given before switching to another Resonator.

- Ciaccona is immune to interruptions and takes 50% less DMG.

- Exit Recital by {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tapping PC=pressing Gamepad=pressing} Resonance Liberation again or switching Ciaccona back onto the field.

- Ensemble Sylphs can now directly grant Aero DMG Bonus provided by Solo Concert.



Symphonic Poem: Tonic

Green Tonic: Deal Aero DMG to nearby targets and inflict a stack of Aero Erosion on targets hit.

Yellow Tonic: Deal Aero DMG to nearby targets and inflict a stack of Spectro Frazzle on targets hit.

texts.name: Roaming with the Wind
texts.description:
Attack the target to deal Aero DMG and inflict a stack of Aero Erosion.

Follow up with Basic Attack in time to cast Basic Attack Stage 3.

texts.name: Symphony of Wind and Verse
texts.description:
Heavy Attack - Quadruple Downbeat

When there are 3 segments of Musical Essence, Heavy Attack is replaced with Heavy Attack - Quadruple Downbeat.

Consume all Musical Essence to shoot Downbeat Notes forward to deal Aero DMG, pulling in the nearby targets and inflicting 1 stack of Aero Erosion on the target hit.

Heavy Attack - Quadruple Downbeat can be cast in mid-air close to the ground.



Musical Essence

Ciaccona can hold up to 3 segments of Musical Essence.

Casting Basic Attack Stage 4 or Intro Skill recovers 1 segment of Musical Essence.

texts.name: Singer's Triple Cadenza
texts.description:
Ciaccona and Ensemble Sylphs perform an Improvised Symphonic Poem together, dealing Aero DMG once to the nearby targets and entering Recital.

texts.name: Where Wind Sings
texts.description: Casting Resonance Skill Harmonic Allegro grants Ciaccona immunity to interruption for 3s. Casting Basic Attack increases Ciaccona's ATK by 35% for 10s.

texts.name: Song of the Four Seasons
texts.description: During Resonance Liberation Singer's Triple Cadenza, Resonators in the team gain 40% Aero DMG Bonus.

texts.name: Starlit Improv
texts.description: Casting Basic Attack Stage 4 additionally grants 1 of Musical Essence. Resonance Skill Harmonic Allegro gains 1 more charge.

texts.name: Toccata and Fugue
texts.description:
Ciaccona ignores 45% of the targets' DEF when dealing damage with Heavy Attack Quadruple Downbeat;

Ciaccona ignores 45% of the targets' DEF when dealing Resonance Liberation DMG.

texts.name: Eternal Idyll to Lasting Summer
texts.description:
Gain 40% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus;

DMG taken by Resonators within and around the range of Resonance Liberation Singer's Triple Cadenza is reduced by 30%.

texts.name: Unending Cadence
texts.description: When in Solo Concert, Ciaccona or Ensemble Sylph deals Aero DMG equal to 220% of Ciaccona's ATK to nearby targets, considered Resonance Liberation DMG.
